sentences.en: History is a constant process of reassessment.
In today's cartoon a schoolteacher seems to have taken this reassessment rather far.
sentences.cn: 在今天的这幅漫画中,一位教师看来已经接受了对这段历史的重新评估,但又有点过了.

sentences.en: My description of it needed reassessment.
sentences.cn: 需要重新估计我对此事的说法.

sentences.en: Periodic reassessment should be performed to determine the need for maintenance treatment.
sentences.cn: 应定期评估以确定是否需要维持治疗.

sentences.en: The new edition , however, will not require any specific reassessment for certification.
sentences.cn: 新版本不需要特定的重新认证的.

sentences.en: There must be a continuing reassessment in light of the world population situation.
sentences.cn: 这种服务的力度必须按照世界人口形势不断地做出新的评估.

sentences.en: There's a total reassessment of what people want out of life.
sentences.cn: 对于人们对生活有什么样的期待有了重新评价。

sentences.en: This reassessment process will last until early March.
sentences.cn: 这个重新评估的过程会持续直到三月初.

sentences.en: This reassessment, which can be very painful, is also very valuable.
sentences.cn: 这重新评价(自我)的过程虽然是痛苦的, 但也是非常有益的.

sentences.en: Will my organization need a full reassessment once the revised standards are available?
sentences.cn: 当修改后标准颁布后,我们是否必须对自己的体系重新做一次审核?

words.tran_cn: [经]重新评估；重新估价；重新考虑

trans.tran_en: If you make a reassessment of something, you think about it and decide whether you need to change your opinion about it
